mapper.select: SELECT msg.message_content, msg.message_time, msg.message_delete, u.USER_ID AS message_sender , msg.chatroom_no FROM chat_message_tb msg INNER JOIN user_tb u ON msg.message_sender = u.user_no WHERE msg.chatroom_no = #{roomNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatroom_tb(CHATROOM_NO, CHATROOM_NAME, CHATROOM_CODE,USER_NO) VALUES (chatroom_no_seq.nextval, #{chatroomName}, #{chatroomCode},#{userNo})
